Functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into a minimalist design. Vastu principles suggest east or north facing for prosperity and health.
Private master bedroom featuring minimalistic interior, south-east facing window to maintain positive energy flow as per Vastu recommendations.
Second bedroom designed for guests or family use. Minimalist style with natural light access and good ventilation.
